Our results then suggest that the crossover from hopping to band-like transport occurs due to the large variation in the injected carrier concentration in negative and positive V
DS regime. To confirm this, we have analytically estimated the carrier concentration and corresponding Fermi level in both regimes. The total charge concentration in the channel at a spatial position x (distance from the injecting electrode) can be written as:
